title: BOC views previous salary
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has navigated to an approved MJ contract 
AND the player has had a previous MJ contract
custom_steps:
WHEN the user clicks Print 
AND selects Contract Terms
custom_expected: THEN the Previous Salary will be populated on the contract terms report

title: Club views previous salary
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has navigated to an approved MJ contract 
AND the player has had a previous MJ contract
custom_steps:
WHEN the user clicks Print 
AND selects Contract Terms
custom_expected: THEN the Previous Salary will be populated on the contract terms report

title: Make sure Previous salary matched previous salary in ebis 1 report
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has printed contract terms for a player
custom_steps: WHEN the user prints the contract terms for the same contract in ebis1
custom_expected: THEN the previous salary will be the same on both reports

title: BOC user views Deferred Comp Utility
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has clicked on the Major Contracts Tab
custom_steps: WHEN the users clicks on the "Def Comp Funding" tab
custom_expected:
THEN the layout will match the wireframe and data discovery 
AND org will be defaulted to blank 

Wireframe: 
http://copbdc.axshare.com/#p=deferred_compensation_funding

Data Discovery: 
https://u8r.jamacloud.com/perspective.req?projectId=14044&docId=2347746

title: BOC selects Org to view in deferred comp utility
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has navigated to the Deferred comp utility
custom_steps: WHEN the user selects and org and clicks View
custom_expected: THEN the page will refresh and display the Def Comp for the selected Org

title: Club user views Deferred Comp Utility
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has clicked on the Major Contracts Tab
custom_steps: WHEN the users clicks on the "Def Comp Funding" tab
custom_expected:
THEN the layout will match the wireframe and data discovery 
AND org will be defaulted to blank

Wireframe: 
http://copbdc.axshare.com/#p=deferred_compensation_funding

Data Discovery: 
https://u8r.jamacloud.com/perspective.req?projectId=14044&docId=2347746

title: BOC user views Exemption Details
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has navigated to the Deferred Comp Utility
custom_steps: WHEN they click on the View Details link
custom_expected:
THEN a popup will display the Exemption details for the current view of the screen
AND clicking outside the popup will close it

title: Club user views Exemption Details
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has navigated to the Deferred Comp Utility
custom_steps: WHEN they click on the View Details link
custom_expected:
THEN a popup will display the Exemption details for the current view of the screen
AND clicking outside the popup will close it

title: View the % funded in Deferred Comp Utility
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has navigated to the Deferred Comp Utility
custom_steps: WHEN they view the Totals Section
custom_expected: THEN they will see % Funded by the Organization using the selected As of Date and discount Rate

title: View Deferred Comp Utility using a different Funding As Of date
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is viewing the deferred comp utility
custom_steps:
WHEN the user updates the Funding As of Date field 
AND clicks View
custom_expected: THEN the deferred comp utility will refresh the page to reflect the new date

title: View note reflecting current deadlines
custom_steps: WHEN viewing the note on the Deferred Comp Screen
custom_expected:
THEN 
* The Note will always detail when Funding certifications are due to the Commissioner's Office based off of the selected "Funding As Of" date. 
* Text will read "Funding certifications due to the Commissioner's Office by Date 1 (format ex: July 31, 2016); Date 2; Date 3; and Date 4
* Date 1 will be replaced  July 31, (year selected in funding as of filter); Date 2 will be replaced by October 31, (year selected in funding as of filter); Date 3 will be replaced by January 31, (year selected in funding as of filter + 1); and Date 4 will be replaced by April 30, (year selected in funding as of filter +1)  

*NOTE - last AC is how it works in ebis1. We have altered this slightly to reorder the dates and only showing dates occurring AFTER the entered as of date. (Ex: if funding as of is set to february 2018 it will read - Funding certifications due to the Commissioner's Office by 4/30/2018; 7/31/2018; 10/31/2018; and 1/31/2019) This is good for now and we will change later if users push back. *

title: View funding ranges being used on the Deferred comp funding utility
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has navigated to the Deferred Comp Utility
custom_steps: WHEN they click on the plus sign to expand the Funding Ranges section
custom_expected:
THEN the proper funding ranges will display 
AND The "with money earned no later than" column differs depending on the date being used to populate the deferred comp funding screen (the funding as of date)
AND Each line always shows MUST BE FUNDED at the end.
AND The note at the top always reads "Note: Contracts signed prior to 12/31/1985 do not need to be funded"

title: Multiple credits/refunds from the same source in single column
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is viewing the payroll tab of a contract
custom_steps: WHEN multiple credits or refunds exist for the same year, org, and type.
custom_expected: THEN roll them up into a single column on the payroll screen.
